activities: End user IP addresses are captured per session for internal security use.  Usernames are usually the end user's corporate email.  User First Name / Last Name is also associated to login.  The platform incoming will be identified: web will show browser, mobile app will show iOS device, and Salesforce.com app will show SFDC flag + browser.  User's information is associated to the user activities.  All information is private, segmented by customer, and used for usage purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
